description: Detaches one or more target groups from the specified Auto Scaling group. When you detach a target group, it enters the Removing state while deregistering the instances in the group. When all instances are deregistered, then you can no longer describe the target group using the DescribeLoadBalancerTargetGroups API call. The instances remain running.

parameters.name: AutoScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: TargetGroupARNs
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the target groups. You can specify up to 10 target groups. (string) ---
